Skip to contentStart a new groupLog inSign upPart of WordPress – 776 groups?Jinja WordPress MeetupJinja, Uganda607 membersPublic group?Organized by WordPress and 6 othersShare:AboutEventsMembersPhotosDiscussionsMoreJoin this groupWhat we're about        We're a group of local WordPress developers, designers, and publishers who get together to share our knowledge and experience, and to meet other WordPress users in Jinja and nearby towns. This WordPress Meetup is open to all who love WordPress --- join us! Learn more about WordPress Meetups at https://make.wordpress.org/community/meetups/WordPress Global Community Sponsors help fund WordPress Meetup groups and WordCamps around the world. Thank you to WordPress.com, WooCommerce, Jetpack, Nexcess, Bluehost, and Weglot, for their support!Upcoming events (1)See allWP20 Celebration: Online and In-Person Event by Jinja WordPress MeetupSat May 27 2023 11:00:00 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time), Sat May 27 2023 11:00:00 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time) UTCWP20 Celebration: Online and In-Person Event by Jinja WordPress MeetupLink visible for attendees   Hello members,
We are excited to announce that we are joining the global WP20 Celebration on May 27, 2023, to mark the 20th anniversary of WordPress. WordPress is the open source platform that powers millions of websites around the world, including ours. It has a vibrant community of users and contributors who share their passion and expertise with each other.
Join us for a fun and festive event where we will celebrate WordPress and its amazing achievements. We will have a live online session on Zoom and YouTube, as well as a physical gathering at The Innovation Village, Jinja starting from 2:00pm EAT. You can choose to join us online or in person, depending on your preference and availability.
We will have some activities to make this event memorable and enjoyable, such as:

Sharing our WordPress stories and memories using the hashtag #WP20
Watching a video message from WordPress co-founder Matt Mullenweg
Playing some WordPress trivia and quizzes
And more!

To register for this event, please RSVP whether you will join us online or in person.
We look forward to celebrating with you and showing our appreciation for WordPress and its community. Don’t miss this opportunity to connect with fellow WordPress enthusiasts and have some fun!
See you soon,
